meeting_annotations.transcript: Sure. Hi everyone. I am Ty Robinson. I'm an assistant professor at Northern Arizona University. And we also do mission relevant instrumentation, so looking at what what different characteristics samples would look like by the instruments that we send say on Mars Rovers.
